item.description:
Hey, I have this Monday night free, waddayano.

Anyone up for getting together for the inaugural roaming knitting group?

I got an offer from a member of the nerd herd to crash a group that meets at Carberry's Monday nights in Central Sq, Cambridge from 6 - 7:30.

This group knits for donation via Boston Cares (tho you can work on personal projects): Knit for the Greater Good: Mittens and Scarves for Kids at Camp Sunshine

NEW KNITTERS WELCOME - go to a yarn shop (Mind's Eye in Cambridge, Windsor Button in Boston), ask the nice people there for fat needles and fat yarn to make your first scarf - they'll set you up, and come on by.

R2-D2 hat by Carissa Browning
item.name: Nerds and Fiber - a roaming knitting group.
